name: National Institute of Women Child & Youth Development
briefDescription: Core Issues being addressed by NIWCYD•	Livelihood issue of the tribals and marginal farmers through Natural Resource Management, Agriculture development ensuring women participation.•	Strengthening of Community Based Organisations and Panchayati Raj Institutions.•	Political and Economic empowerment of the women.•	Reducing the Child Mortality and Malnutrition•	Child rights campaign•	Social security of unorganized sector•	Sanitation and HealthWork of NIWCYD revolves basically in the rural and remote tribal areas with the focus on:1.	Ethnic groups viz. Baigas, Gonds, Korkus, Mowasi, Madias and Saharia.2.	Marginal Farmers3.	Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe children4.	Delinquent, neglected and street children5.	Child labour
